Cheetor:




You're in deep, was what Optimus would say. It's you're problem, you get 
yourself out of it. Cheetor sat with his head down, trying to think what the 
heck to do. What was he going to do marooned here? No one was here to pull 
his tail out of this, neither Optimus or Rattrap. He wasn't going to live 
the rest of his life here. His fighter ship was in the lake and there was 
nothing he could improvise; everything was scrap. He wasn't going near the 
Arc again.

"Just do something," he mumbled to himself. He picked himself up. "Beast 
mode," he said, and transformed. He decided to walk around and see what he 
could discover. So he went.
